name: CASTLE - Inspired by RE VILLAGE
description:
They took your daughter. Now, you must do whatever it takes to get her back...

CASTLE  is a not for-profit, fan game of the hit 2021 title, RESIDENT EVIL VILLAGE. Taking place within the infamous Castle Dimitrescu, you once again play as the hero, Ethan Winters, in search of your kidnapped daughter, Rose. Traverse the dark halls of the Castle, uncover its mysteries, and slowly but surely, close in on your daughter's location.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys, WASDMove Ethan, Move CursorZ, EnterInteract with Item, Select OptionX, ESCOpen Inventory, Go Back, CancelPSkip Cutscene

*Castle currently only supports keyboard input, gamepads/controllers will not work

*NOTE: RESIDENT EVIL VILLAGE and all associated intellectual property are products of CAPCOM and the official RESIDENT EVIL team. Please support the official franchise and games. This project is not for-profit, and for entertainment purposes only.

CASTLE is a demo project, built from the ground up as a way for me to learn Unity and how to go about creating a title - start to finish. Please look forward to future (original) titles!
